-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema db_api

CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `db_api` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `db_api` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_api`.`epreuve`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_api`.`epreuve` (
  `id_epreuve` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `nom_epreuve` VARCHAR(150) NULL,
  `date_epreuve` DATE NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_epreuve`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
KEY_BLOCK_SIZE = 1;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_api`.`categories`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_api`.`categories` (
  `id_categories` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `m1` TINYINT NULL,
  `m2` TINYINT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_categories`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_api`.`participants`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_api`.`participants` (
  `id_participants` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `nom_participant` VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  `prenom_participant` VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  `epreuve_id_epreuve` INT NOT NULL,
  `categories_id_categories` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_participants`, `epreuve_id_epreuve`, `categories_id_categories`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_participants_epreuve`
    FOREIGN KEY (`epreuve_id_epreuve`)
    REFERENCES `db_api`.`epreuve` (`id_epreuve`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_participants_categories1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`categories_id_categories`)
    REFERENCES `db_api`.`categories` (`id_categories`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE INDEX `fk_participants_epreuve_idx` ON `db_api`.`participants` (`epreuve_id_epreuve` ASC) VISIBLE;

CREATE INDEX `fk_participants_categories1_idx` ON `db_api`.`participants` (`categories_id_categories` ASC) VISIBLE;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_api`.`passages`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_api`.`passages` (
  `id_passages` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `temp_1` FLOAT NULL,
  `temp_2` FLOAT NULL,
  `meilleur_temp` FLOAT NULL,
  `participants_id_participants` INT NOT NULL,
  `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_passages`, `participants_id_participants`, `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_passages_participants1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`participants_id_participants` , `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve`)
    REFERENCES `db_api`.`participants` (`id_participants` , `epreuve_id_epreuve`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE INDEX `fk_passages_participants1_idx` ON `db_api`.`passages` (`participants_id_participants` ASC, `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve` ASC) VISIBLE;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_api`.`result`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_api`.`result` (
  `id_result` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `participants_id_participants` INT NOT NULL,
  `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve` INT NOT NULL,
  `participants_categories_id_categories` INT NOT NULL,
  `meilleur_temp` FLOAT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_result`, `participants_id_participants`, `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve`, `participants_categories_id_categories`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_result_participants1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`participants_id_participants` , `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve` , `participants_categories_id_categories`)
    REFERENCES `db_api`.`participants` (`id_participants` , `epreuve_id_epreuve` , `categories_id_categories`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE INDEX `fk_result_participants1_idx` ON `db_api`.`result` (`participants_id_participants` ASC, `participants_epreuve_id_epreuve` ASC, `participants_categories_id_categories` ASC) VISIBLE;
